verses.verse: Thus all the work <S%H4399><s%> that Solomon <S%H8010><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was finished. <S%H7999><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> in the things <S%H6944><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> had dedicated, <S%H6944><s%> even the silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the gold, <S%H2091><s%> and all the vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them in the treasuries <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

Then Solomon <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes, <S%H4294><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to bring up <S%H5927><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> which is Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves to the king <S%H4428><s%> at the feast, <S%H2282><s%> which was in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>
All the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came: <S%H935><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> the ark; <S%H727><s%>

and they brought up <S%H5927><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and all the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the Tent; <S%H168><s%> these the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> brought up. <S%H5927><s%>

King <S%H4428><s%> Solomon <S%H8010><s%> and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> to him, <S%H6440><s%> were before the ark, <S%H727><s%> sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and cattle, <S%H1241><s%> that could not be counted <S%H5608><s%> nor numbered <S%H4487><s%> for multitude. <S%H7230><s%>

The priests <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to its place, <S%H4725><s%> into the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house, <S%H1004><s%> to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H3671><s%> even under the wings of the cherubim. <S%H3742><s%>

For the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%> over the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark, <S%H727><s%> and the cherubim <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and its poles <S%H905><s%> above. <S%H4605><s%>

The poles <S%H905><s%> were so long <S%H748><s%> that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the poles <S%H905><s%> were seen <S%H7200><s%> from the ark <S%H727><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle; <S%H1687><s%> but they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> outside: <S%H2351><s%> and there it is to this day. <S%H3117><s%>

There was nothing in the ark <S%H727><s%> except the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> when they came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

It happened, <S%H3548><s%> when the priests had come out <S%H3318><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, <S%H3548><s%> (for all the priests who were present <S%H4672><s%> had sanctified <S%H6942><s%> themselves, <S%H8104><s%> and didn't keep their divisions; <S%H4256><s%>

also the Levites <S%H3881><s%> who were the singers, <S%H7891><s%> all of them, <S%H623><s%> even Asaph, Heman, <S%H1968><s%> Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their brothers, <S%H251><s%> arrayed <S%H3847><s%> in fine linen, <S%H948><s%> with cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and stringed instruments <S%H5035><s%> and harps, <S%H3658><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at the east end <S%H4217><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and with them one hundred <S%H3967><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> sounding <S%H2690><s%> with trumpets; <S%H2689><s%>)

it happened, <S%H2690><s%> when the trumpeters and singers <S%H7891><s%> were as one, <S%H259><s%> to make one <S%H259><s%> sound <S%H6963><s%> to be heard <S%H8085><s%> in praising <S%H1984><s%> and thanking <S%H3034><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and when they lifted up <S%H7311><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> with the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> and cymbals <S%H4700><s%> and instruments <S%H3627><s%> of music, <S%H7892><s%> and praised <S%H1984><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H2896><s%> "For he is good; for his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> endures forever! <S%H5769><s%>" that then the house <S%H1004><s%> was filled <S%H4390><s%> with a cloud, <S%H6051><s%> even the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%>

so that the priests <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud: <S%H6051><s%> for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
